content:
Sure, here are some unique thesis topics that can be done by undergraduate students:

1. Design and development of a low-cost unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) for agricultural crop monitoring.
2. Experimental study of the aerodynamics of different types of airfoils used in aircraft wings.
3. Analysis of the effectiveness of different control strategies for quadcopter flight stabilization.
4. Design and development of a portable wind tunnel for aerodynamic testing of small-scale models.
5. Investigation of the effects of winglets on the aerodynamic performance of an aircraft wing.
6. Development of a computer vision system for object tracking in aerial images captured by a drone.
7. Analysis of the aerodynamic performance of different types of propellers used in quadcopters.
8. Design and development of an automated landing system for small-scale UAVs.
9. Investigation of the effects of wing shape on the stability of a small-scale glider.
10. Development of a real-time obstacle detection and avoidance system for a quadcopter.
11. Analysis of the effect of different types of wingtip devices on the lift and drag of an aircraft wing.
12. Design and development of an autonomous ground vehicle for precision agriculture.
13. Investigation of the effects of control surface size and placement on the stability of a model airplane.
14. Analysis of the aerodynamic performance of different types of airfoils used in wind turbine blades.
15. Development of a system for automatic geolocation of aerial images captured by a drone.
16. Investigation of the effects of wing loading on the stability and handling of a model airplane.
17. Design and development of a quadcopter swarm for surveillance applications.
18. Analysis of the aerodynamic performance of a bird's wing and its implications for aircraft design.
19. Development of a low-cost thermal imaging system for aerial surveillance applications.
20. Investigation of the effects of different types of control surfaces on the stability of a model airplane.
21. Design and development of a small-scale glider for low-altitude atmospheric research.
22. Analysis of the aerodynamic performance of different types of rotor blades used in helicopters.
23. Development of a system for automatic recognition of crop types in aerial images captured by a drone.
24. Investigation of the effects of wing sweep angle on the stability and handling of a model airplane.
25. Design and development of an autonomous underwater vehicle for oceanographic research.
26. Analysis of the aerodynamic performance of different types of wings used in gliders.
27. Development of a system for real-time monitoring of crop health using multispectral imagery.
28. Investigation of the effects of control surface deflection on the stability and handling of a model airplane.
29. Design and development of a low-cost autonomous boat for marine research.
30. Analysis of the aerodynamic performance of different types of airfoils used in sailboats.
